data.title: Temple University
data.meta_description: Marcus Day (45) Tight End - 2022 (Redshirt Freshman): Provided depth at tight end ... did not see game action. 2021 (Freshman): Joined the team as a walk-on ...
data.text:
2022 (Redshirt Freshman): Provided depth at tight end ... did not see game action.

2021 (Freshman): Joined the team as a walk-on in the summer ... did not see game action ... American Athletic Conference All-Academic Team ... redshirted.

High School: Played quarterback and safety at Altoona Area School District under head coach Vince Nedimyer … was a three-year letterwinner and was voted team captain as a senior and junior … as a senior, helped Altoona become District 6 and Regional Champions by recording 1,087 total yards and 15 total touchdowns … won Offensive Rookie of the Year as a sophomore … was also a four-time letterwinner in baseball … four-year Honor Roll.

Personal: Born Marcus Xavier Day in Altoona … parents are Leah Sheffer and David Day ... brother Maceo (22) … father David served in the United States Marine Corps ... list of favorites include: Creed (movie), Baltimore Ravens (pro sports team), Aaron Donald (pro athlete).
